name: Number Puzzle Pack (Free)
description:
• Shuffle the numbers and then put them back in order!
• Every puzzle is a unique experience!
• Master the 8 Modes: 3X3, 4X4, 5X5, 6X6, 7X7, 8X8, 9X9, 10X10
• Play many hours of number puzzles and workout your brain!
• Dominate on multiple Leaderboards!
• Share your results with Family & Friends on Facebook, Twitter, or SinaWeibo.

Instructions:
Tap the big button to shuffle the board and put the numbers back in order.

Features:
- 8 Modes: 3X3, 4X4, 5X5, 6X6, 7X7, 8X8, 9X9, 10X10
- Random puzzle with every game. Infinite possibilities.
- Compete on 8 different Leaderboards!
- Turn Animation ON for a more natural feel or OFF for a speed boost!
- Move multiple tiles at once to save time!
- Statistics keeps track of best, average and total scores
- Share scores on: Facebook, Twitter, Email, SinaWeibo
